title: Another suspect arrested over Maligakanda shooting incident
byline: Another suspect has been arrested by the police in connection with a shooting and attempted murder of a woman near the Maligakanda Court.

title: ADIC raises concerns over Excise chief’s proposal on illicit alcohol
byline: The Alcohol and Drug Information Centre (ADIC) has issued a statement regarding the proposal by the Commissioner General of Excise to introduce alcohol at a lower price.

title: Azerbaijan Airlines plane crashes over Kazakhstan
byline: An Azerbaijan Airlines passenger jet flying from the capital Baku to Grozny in Russia’s Chechnya crashed on Wednesday in western Kazakhstan, the Kazakh transport ministry said on Wednesday.

title: Father and son arrested over murder in Madampe
byline: Two individuals wanted in connection with a murder were apprehended in the Dematapitiya area of Madampe last evening (24).

title: Police take action against over 8,700 traffic law violators in 24 hrs
byline: Sri Lanka Police says legal action has been taken against a total of 8,747 motorists for violating traffic laws, including 251 individuals driving under the influence of liquor, during the last 24 hours.

title: Christopher Nolan’s next film is based on ‘The Odyssey’
byline: Christopher Nolan is following his Oscar-winning “Oppenheimer” with a true epic: Homer’s “The Odyssey.” It will open in theaters on July 17, 2026, Universal Pictures said Monday.

title: AI will eavesdrop on world’s wildest places to track and help protect endangered wildlife
byline: The endangered Geoffrey’s spider monkeys that dangle high in the rainforest canopy are elusive and hard for scientists to track.

title: Kazakhstan says at least 32 survived Azerbaijan Airlines plane crash, over 30 likely dead
byline: An Azerbaijani airliner with 67 people onboard crashed Wednesday in the Kazakhstani city of Aktau, leaving at least 32 survivors, according to officials. More than 30 people are likely dead.

title: SLCERT warns of increased online scams during festive season
byline: The Sri Lanka Computer Emergency Readiness Team (SLCERT) has reported a sharp rise in online scams during the festive season.

title: Gang responsible for over 24 robberies busted while hiding in Kandy
byline: A group of suspects who broke into more than 21 houses and jewellery shops in various parts of the island and stole valuables and property including cash, gold items, mobile phones, etc. worth millions of rupees have been arrested by the Galaha Police in Kandy.

title: 18-hour water cut in several areas
byline: The National Water Supply and Drainage Board (NWS&DB) announced that the water supply to several areas in the Western Province will be suspended for 18 hours starting tomorrow morning (26).

title: Pope calls for world to silence arms and overcome divisions in Christmas address
byline: Pope Francis in his traditional Christmas message on Wednesday urged “all people of all nations” to find courage during this Holy Year ”to silence the sounds of arms and overcome divisions” plaguing the world, from the Middle East to Ukraine, Africa to Asia.

title: Three including 2 children missing while sea bathing in Thirukkovil
byline: Three individuals including two children are reported missing after being swept away by strong currents while bathing in the seas off Sangaman Kanda in Thirukkovil, the police said.
